original_title: Popular Mechanics For Kids - X-Treme Sports & Other Action Adventures
overview: Takes sports to the extreme! Learn to fly like the wind when you take waterskiing to a whole new level, speed down a hill at lightening speed with no brakes, hit the mountains to meet some Olympic snowboarders and gear up for some off road racing.
title: Popular Mechanics For Kids - X-Treme Sports & Other Action Adventures
